connect_help_text: Please connect wallet to continue playing.

leaderboard.head: Be the rarest Otto to win the prize!
leaderboard.item_desc: Increase your Otto’s rarity by equipping the epic items, or you can summon a genetically rare Otto!
leaderboard.reward_desc: The higher your rank, the more prize you will win! All top 50% Ottos can win the rewards.
leaderboard.reward_link: See how the rank vs prize works >
leaderboard.title: Leaderboard

checkWL.desc: Only the whitelisted accounts are qualified to mint Otto Portals at the Whitelist-only Sale. Connect wallet to see if you’re on the list!
checkWL.has-wl-desc: Get ready! Your Otto Portals will be able to mint at {{time}}
checkWL.no-wl-desc: Don’t worry. You can join your Discord, and prepare for the Public Sale at {{time}}.
checkWL.title: Check if you’re Whitelisted

hero.desc: Mint Otto Portal and summon your unique Otto NFTs. Otto? Lottie? Cleo? It’s all surprise!
hero.subtitle: Summon your own Otto NFTs
hero.title: Otto Portals

intro.step1_desc:
We accept $CLAM for Otto Portal purchase. This is a simple way to join the continued growth of the Otter Kingdom.

1 Portal = 50 CLAM
intro.step2_desc: One portal opens randomly from 1 to 8 Ottos, but only 1 can proceed to go through the portal. For this reason, the user will still need to choose 1 Otto to get through the portal and become an Otto NFT. Once it’s confirmed, the portal NFT’s appearance will be changed to the Otto’s!
intro.step2_title: Open Otto Portal and get Otto candidates
intro.step3_desc: After deciding your favorite Otto NFT, you have to summon the one you picked to get to the portal and formally join the Otter Kingdom. This process will trigger another transaction to update the NFT appearance.
intro.title: How do Otto Portals work?

mint.info_desc: One portal mints one Otto. Mint portals to summon your Otto and begin your Otterverse adventure!
mint.title: Mint Portal

mint.please_connect: Please connect your wallet to proceed the process.

popup.processing: Processing... Please do not close the window. The transaction will be finished soon.

mint.title: Mint Portals

my_items.legendary_warning: Warning: If you add or replace any items to the Legendary Otto, the Legendary frame will be removed and the BRS +100 bonus will be withdrawn.
my_items.no_selected_item: Select an item to view the detail.

take_off_item.title: Take off the item from your Otto

my_items.title: My Items

use_item.completed_subtitle: Does it look better or worse? idk.
use_item.completed_title: Ta-da! Your Otto seems to have changed a bit.
use_item.processing:
Processing...
The transaction will be finished soon.
use_item.title: Select an Otto to use this item

wear_item.title: Select an Otto to wear this item

my_ottos.no_otto: You don't have any otto yet.
my_ottos.title: My Ottos

my_portals.legendary_desc: Legendary Ottos deserve legendary owners. Are you up for the challenge?
my_portals.no_portal: You don't have any portal yet.

state.OPENED: The portal is now open, but only one Otto can be summoned. Choose wisely.

my_portals.title: My Portals

otto.chosen_one:
This Otto is the chosen one!
The upcoming epoch falls to {{birthday}}. All Otto, Lotties and Cleo that the Birthday is same to the date are blessed with special boosts!
otto.classic_note: A general Otto that shares the peace all over the Otter Kingdom.
otto.coatOfArms: This Otter’s coat of arms is {{arms}}
otto.constellation_boost: The upcoming epoch falls to {{constellation}}. The god of {{constellation}} has blessed every {{constellation}} Otto, Lottie and Cleo with glory and power!
otto.first_gen_desc: Total 5,000 Ottos for the 1st generation in the kingdom.
otto.legendary_boost_removed:
BRS+0
(The initial traits have been replaced)
otto.legendary_note: Artist chosen Otto that is super rare and unique.
otto.title: Otto Details
otto.unreturnable_hint: This item came along with the Otto the moment it was minted, so it cannot be detached and returned to your item inventory. You can still wear another wearable item to replace and hide it. If the other wearable item is taken off, this item will be visible again on the Otter.

portal.candidates_title: Choose your Otto to join the Otter Kingdom:
portal.open_desc_2: waiting at this portal, but you still need one more step to summon an Otto to go through the portal. Once it’s confirmed, the portal NFT’s appearance will be changed to the Otto’s!

open_popup.desc_one: Your Otto is ready to join the Otterverse, but you still need to go back to summon this Otto through the portal.
open_popup.desc_other: They are ready to enter the Otterverse, but each portal only has the power to transport one Otto. Head back to the summon page to pick your favorite Otto. Choose wisely!
open_popup.headline_1: Don’t fret. You might have the best Otto yet!
open_popup.headline_3: One for me, three for thee!
open_popup.headline_4: Four is more, but you need a super rare score!
open_popup.headline_5: Now this is what I call a selection!
open_popup.headline_7: Seven is heaven! Which will you choose?
open_popup.headline_8: Eight is great…but wait! Who do I take?
open_popup.headline_legendary: Legendary Ottos deserve legendary owners. Are you up for the challenge?
open_popup.processing:
Processing...

It might take a few minutes to finish the portal opening process.
Please do not close the window! Thanks for your patience ʕ•̫͡•ʔ b
open_popup.title_one: There is {{count}} Otto at the portal
open_popup.title_other: There are {{count}} Ottos at the portal

portal.otto_candidate_desc: The attribute values and rarity score will reveal after you summon this Otto

state.CAN_OPEN: This Portal is ready to initiate!
state.OPENED: The portal is now open, but only one Otto can be summoned. Choose wisely.

summon_popup.desc:
Congrats!
This Otto just officially joined the Otter Kingdom and became one of the members of our big, warm family.
Find out more about this Otto now!

diamond.desc: From armor that can stand the mightiest of blows, to hats that'll catch even the sleepiest Otters attention, Shell Chests hold the equipment you need to make your dream come true!
diamond.name: Diamond Chest

golden.desc: Golden Shell Chests offer a great chance to receive high tier equipment. Though not as lucky as a Diamond Shell Chests, it's brimming with potential!
golden.name: Golden Chest

silver.desc: While not as lucky as the Golden/Diamond Shell Chests, Silver Shell Chests contain rare and powerful equipment worthy of admiration!
silver.name: Silver Chest

store.chest_desc: The store is stocked with 3 types of Shell Chests for purchase! Your chances of finding Epic/Legendary equipment increases with each level of Shell Chest! To see the probability of obtaining different rarities with each Chest, please visit

popup.open_title: Clamazing!! What a great selection! Your Otto is going to look so cool!
popup.processing:
Processing...
It might take a few minutes to finish the transaction. Please do not close the window! Thanks for your patience ʕ•̫͡•ʔ b

product_card.airdrop: You have {{amount}} for free. Claim now!

store.subtitle_1: These Shell Chests contain more than 600+ pieces of special, wearable equipment, and they're on sale! The more you buy, the more you save! Each Chest holds 1 item!
store.subtitle_2: Good things come to Otters who wait, unless they're on sale! These Shell Chests are a deal worth running for!
store.title: Ottopia Store

giveaway.title: Giveaway
giveaway.headline: Silver Shell Chest Giveaway
giveaway.subtitle: Follow the 4 easy steps to complete the mission, and you will get a Silver Shell Chest FOR FREE!

steps.headline: Complete the following 4 steps to get reward:
